name: Jemacu.github.io
tagline: Vancouver Island Cycling Routes and Campsites
body:
### Site Under Construction.
I created this as a useful reference for me and as a way of learning more about Github and .geojson files.  
However, if you are planning a cycling or camping trip on Vancouver Island, you may find it useful too.

I have only just started, so there is a lot more info to be added

### Map
<script src="https://embed.github.com/view/geojson/Jemacu/Jemacu.github.io/master/routesmap.geojson"></script>  
Map here.

```
$ code sample
```

### Campgrounds & other point features
Campgrounds include BC Provincial parks, commercial campgrounds and recreation sites. Other points include bicycle shops, stores and sites of interests.

### Authors and Contributors
So far just me.
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
